==How to Participate==
#Based on any piece of information in the Event Puzzle image, find the corresponding location in the Inazuma region and take a picture.
#Post the picture on Twitter and include the hashtags #LightningHunt and #GenshinImpact, along with tagging @GenshinImpact (please be sure to check for the official account with the verified badge).
#Traveler participation is deemed successful once the two steps above are completed~

==Event Rewards==
*Blessing of Narukami (5 Winners): Primogems ×1,000 + Apple AirPods Pro ×1
*Fluttering Sakura Petals (7 Winners): Primogems ×500 + Apple AirPods ×1
*Lucky Prize (50 Winners): Discord Advanced Nitro subscription valued at USD 9.99

Of all eligible submissions, we will:
*Select five best works and award the Blessing of Narukami Bundle.
*Select seven excellent works and award the Fluttering Sakura Petals Bundle.
*Randomly select 50 works and award the Lucky Prize Bundle.

P.S.: Likes, comments, the number of times works have been forwarded, and other data will, to a certain degree, factor in selecting the winners. If the artwork does not meet expected quality standards, not all prizes may be rewarded.

==Notes==
#Works of the following nature will be regarded as invalid: those with content that violates our Community Rules, those that plagiarize or defraud the work of other creators, those with no relation to Genshin Impact or Lightning Hunt, works that contain any form of advertising, and those which seek to spread malicious rumors or discredit the game or its characters.
#Travelers are allowed multiple submissions for this event, but only one prize can be won per Traveler. The prizes cannot be stacked and only the highest prize won will be awarded.
#Plagiarism, misappropriation, and other actions that violate others' copyright are strictly prohibited. If there is a quote or a need for authorization, please cite the original sources and make sure to obtain authorization.
#The list of winners will be announced within 10 working days after the event ends. Travelers, please pay attention to the official announcements of the prizes and direct messages in time, and submit the winner information within one month. Failure to submit the information in time will result in the forfeiture of your reward. After the information has been collected, the prizes will be delivered via email, in-game mail, and mail to the winning Travelers. Thank you for your patience, Travelers!
